titles.title: Making Objective Drug Evidence Revisions for New Labeling Act of 2020
MODERN Labeling Act of 2020
Making Objective Drug Evidence Revisions for New Labeling Act of 2020
MODERN Labeling Act of 2020
Making Objective Drug Evidence Revisions for New Labeling Act of 2020
MODERN Labeling Act of 2020
MODERN Labeling Act of 2020
To amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to modernize the labeling of certain generic drugs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

action.text: Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Energy and Commerce. H. Rept. 116-573.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 471.

action.text: Mr. Pallone moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 5668.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

term.name: Drug safety, medical device, and laboratory regulation
